entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0207.10722] The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 27,830,000. This concept is used to report the fair value of investments for the glad:OilAndGasIndustryMember industry. The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 120,429,000 that includes the member glad:OilAndGasIndustryMember but also has additional members. This value is used to report the fair value of investments for the following dimensions us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=glad:DebtSecuritiesSecuredSecondLienDebtMember, us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerAffiliationAxis=us-gaap:InvestmentUnaffiliatedIssuerMember, us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis=glad:OilAndGasIndustryMember. The value representing the fair value of investments in the glad:OilAndGasIndustryMember industry is less than the value reported for the value 120,429,000 which is a subset of this industry. The value reported for the industry in aggregate should be more than or equal to the value reported for of 120,429,000. Please ensure that appropriate dimensions have been used to report these values.
Concept : us-gaap:InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue Value : 120,429,000 Period : 2023-09-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis=glad:OilAndGasIndustryMember, us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerAffiliationAxis=us-gaap:InvestmentUnaffiliatedIssuerMember, us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=glad:DebtSecuritiesSecuredSecondLienDebtMember
Rule Element Id:10722 Rule version: 27.0.0RC1 - glad-20240930.htm 8
